header.title: Ajax ShoutBox
header.description: This mod add a fully configurable shoutbox to your forum index.
header.author-notes:
This mod requires for the user visiting the forum that he has eneblad JavaScript. Without JavaScript, the shoutbox isn't displayed.
You can place this shoutbox eveywhere on the forum, the only thing you has to do is editing the correct html file, with the changes that are normally done for index_body.html. If you place it somewhere else as index_body.html you need also to move the calls to as_display (And the include) in index.php to the correct page.
Please report bug or feature requests ONLY at http://shoutbox.paulsohier.nl/ Thats the only place where I will answer bugreports and featurerequests!
Use contrib/upgrade.xml to upgrade from 1.0.3 to 1.2.0, and use contrib/update.xml to update from 1.1.1 to 1.2.0.

changelog.change: First release for the 1.2.x development line, see the wiki for the major changes.
Dont prune message if time is 0.
Dont submit form if you press enter on edit, but trigger the js function instead.
Log prunning
A call-time pass by reference warning fixed
Delete message when decode_message returns empty data.
Bug #49: Delete button wasnt displayed when user has no info permission
Fixed copy instruction with wrong filename for index.php
Fixed bug with installation for mysql4

Bug #58: Check to see if the returned xml in javascript is an object, this directly means that there should be no errors like with undfined function, xml error etc. If these still happen, please report them at trac (Not in the support topic!!!)
Bug #55: Instead of clicking there is now a button to edit.
Dynamic width of username/message field
Fixed a xhtml error
Fixed a JS error when delete was disabled but info was enabled
Fixed a bug that the shoutbox wasnt refreshed after the cancel button was pressed for editing
Fixed a small bug with the wrong count of pruned/removed messages is logged.
Fixed a typo.
Fixed some bugs with edit function
Moved several functions from js.php to static.js
Some small changes, nothing major

action-group.diy-instructions: Point your browser now to the install/index.php directory, to add the sql tables, config items and ACP modules. After that, delete the install directory again! Dont forget to set the permissions after that, as else nobody will see the shoutbox!
